===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[speech]], [[talk]], [[language]]
# what somebody said: (somebody's) words {{zh-mw|句}}
# [[dialect]]
# {{lb|zh|Cantonese}}
## to [[refer]] to; to [[indicate]]; to [[talk]] [[about]]; referring to
## to [[tell]] someone that
##: {{zh-x|使咩 話 俾 佢 聽 呢。|What do you need to tell him for.|C}}
## to [[say]] that; to [[claim]] that
##: {{zh-x|我 唔係 話 你 醜樣{joeng6-2}，只{zi2}係 你 核{wat6}突。|I'm not '''say'''ing that you're ugly, only that you're ugly.|C|ref={{w|George Lam}}, Ah Lam {{lang|zh|日記}}}}
## to [[tell someone off]]
##: {{zh-x|唔 話 佢 呢，佢 就 會{wui5} 繼續 做落去。|Don't tell him off, and he will continue to do it.|C}}
